rutinas.title: Femorals and Glutes
rutinas.description1: This routine is focused on working the femorals and glutes, with exercises such as squats, lunges, and deadlifts.
rutinas.description2: It is recommended to perform 4 sets of 12 repetitions for each exercise, with a 1-minute rest between sets.
rutinas.description3: Remember to stretch before and after the routine to avoid injuries and improve flexibility.
rutinas.description4: Don't forget to hydrate during the routine and maintain a balanced diet to achieve better results.
rutinas.description5: If you have any questions or concerns, consult a fitness professional or personal trainer.
rutinas.description6: Enjoy the routine and feel the benefits of a healthy and active lifestyle!
rutinas.steps1: 1. Squats: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body as if you were sitting in a chair, and return to the starting position. Repeat 12 times.
rutinas.steps2: 2. Lunges: Step forward with one leg, lower your body until both knees are at a 90-degree angle, and return to the starting position. Repeat 12 times on each leg.
rutinas.steps3: 3. Deadlifts: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, bend at the waist, and lower the weights to the ground. Return to the starting position. Repeat 12 times.
rutinas.steps4: 4. Leg Press: Sit on the leg press machine, push the platform away from you, and return to the starting position. Repeat 12 times.
rutinas.steps5: 5. Hip Thrusts: Lie on your back with your feet flat on the ground, lift your hips towards the ceiling, and return to the starting position. Repeat 12 times.
rutinas.steps6: 6. Calf Raises: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, lift your heels off the ground, and return to the starting position. Repeat 12 times.
